details.Restrictions: This application is open source licensed, BSD-2 Clause.

interface.name: Piwik Installation URL
interface.description: Root URL of your working Piwik installation. 'https://piwik.yourdomain.com'. Do not add a trailing '/' character. Ideally should be utilizing SSL for security purposes, but using a schemeless URL '//host.tld' is valid also. Leaving this empty will use the default relative URL '/piwik'

interface.name: Website Id
interface.description: Website Id to be tracked, otherwise it will default to use '1'.

interface.name: Piwik Installation URL
interface.description: Root URL of Piwik installation. 'https://piwik.yourdomain.com'. Do not add a trailing '/' character. Ideally should be utilizing SSL for security purposes. Using a schemeless URL '//host.tld' is also valid for use of other protocols, such as SPDY. But only if your tracker installation supports it. Leaving this empty will use the default relative URL '/piwik'

interface.name: Website Id
interface.description: Website Id to be tracked, otherwise it will default to use '1'.

interface.name: Track visitors across all subdomains
interface.description: So if one visitor visits x.example.com and y.example.com, they will be counted as a unique visitor.

interface.name: Prepend the site domain to the page title when tracking
interface.description: So if someone visits the 'About' page on blog.example.com it will be recorded as 'blog.example.com / About'. This is the easiest way to get an overview of your traffic by sub-domain.

interface.name: In the "Outlinks" report, hide clicks to known alias URLs
interface.description: So clicks on links to Alias URLs (eg. http://*.example.com) will not be counted as 'Outlink'. Example: '"*.other.example.com","*.subdomain.example.com"'

interface.name: Enable client side DoNotTrack detection.
interface.description: So tracking requests will not be sent if visitors do not wish to be tracked. Note: If server side DoNotTrack support has been enabled, this option will have no effect.

interface.name: Advanced Menu Features
interface.description: Easily enable or disable advanced features. Be sure to completely understand them, and what you are typing.

interface.name: Advanced _paq
interface.description:
Push custom Javascript code on to the 'window._paq' array. Malformed code or data may have negative effects.
Examples: Return 0 '[ function() { return 0;} ]'
Get VisitorId and display in console log. '[ function() { return window.console.log( "getVisitorId=" + this.getVisitorId() ); } ]'
Set the Document Title '["setDocumentTitle",document.domain + ' / ' + document.title]'
Implement a heartbeat '['setHeartBeatTimer',30,60]'

interface.name: Debugger
interface.description: Enable or disable the logging, performance, and errors debug output to the client browser Javascript console. Leave this disabled unless there are issues and more information is required.

description: This open source Piwik Analytics CloudFlare application will help you add the Piwik tracking code on your website pages. Click "Setup" to modify your tracking options. Be sure to click "Update" to save after modifying.
name: Piwik Analytics
